Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 67th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1980...
Injured on 5/30/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1983...
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1985...
Injured on 5/10/1985 with a Fractured Knee, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/1987 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/4/1988, off Fernando Valenzuela (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1988, off Tommy Boggs (NYM)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (N) on 7/10/1990...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/25/1991...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 1/31/1993 (Going to HOU: 1B E. Martinez, P M. Perez, SS B. Larkin. Going to PIT: SS J. Valentin, 3B N. Nakamura, 1B A. Cabrera)...
Injured on 9/23/1994 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
